Parties & Groups - Host your next party or get together Book your party Parties & Groups - Host your next party or get together , , SC 29403 map marker pin Welcome to VOTED BEST BAR & BEST OUTDOOR PATIO IN CHARLESTON "Charleston's Choice" 2019 Winner for Best Bar — Post & Courier"Best of Charleston" 2019 Winner for Best Outdoor Patio — Charleston City Paper"Charleston's Choice" 2019 Winner for Best Charleston Downtown Bar- Post and Courier"Best of Charleston" 2020 & 2022 Winner for Best Authentic Pub- Charleston City Paper"Best of the Best" 2022 Winner for the best Charleston Pub/Tavern- Charleston Living Magazine Book a table A HISTORIC TRADITION The term “Blind Tiger” was coined in the late 1800’s to describe the illicit drinking and gambling establishments opening their doors as temperance legislation swept across the country. The first “Blind Tigers” in South Carolina sprung up in the Holy City in 1893 as a defiant rebuttal to the “Dispensary” laws mandated by the infamous Governor Ben “Pitchfork” Tillman. Read more BEVERAGES Enjoy upscale pub fare and a wide selection of local spirits at our one-of-a-kind historical pub & courtyard dining in the beautiful French Quarter area of downtown Charleston. View drinks Specials Sunday Brunch! $15 Mimosa Carafes $10 Bloody Marys $8 High Noons $5 Irish Breakfast Shooters 11:00 AM - 02:00 AM See all specials Voted Best Outdoor Patio in Charleston for the past 4 years Book a table Local beers Our drinks Live music See events Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 Dot slide navigation number 4 slideshow start stop playing Private Parties Book your next party with us! You invite the guests and we will take care of the rest. Blind Tiger has the perfect space for birthday bashes, holiday parties, corporate events, wedding festivities, and more. Book now Gift cards can be purchased over the phone, or at our location Reviews review by - Yelp Ryan H.: Spent a Saturday afternoon on the back patio at Blind Tiger. There's a reason this place is so popular. Lo and Pat are fantastic bartenders. Super friendly and attentive. Lo's mojito is the best I've had outside of Havana. Muddled mint makes all the difference. review by - Yelp Claudia C.: Absolutely loved this place. The staff was awesome and very attentive when I sat down. Loved all the food we got, plan on going back for the C.a.b. Steak Sandwich because they know how to make a good sandwich. We came in on St. Patty's day and with how busy it was they ran the place perfectly. Bathrooms were clean and gender friendly and the patio in the back is a nice addition if you want to be outside and enjoy a drink. If you are in town you need to check this place out! review by - Yelp Dunn F.: This place is amazing. Kitchen closes at 10, so keep that in mind. It's an eclectic clientele and this means never a boring moment. The food is so good. I had my first 'Hot' chicken sandwich with truffle fries. Wow! My buddy opted for Brussel sprouts and they were so crisp and tasty. review by - Yelp Daniela Z.: I love the outdoor courtyard! The Nashville chicken sandwich and caprese panini are the best. For some reason this last time we went the panini kept getting messed up, which wasn't the server's fault, but when it's supposed to be vegetarian and the kitchen decides to add chicken to it, it's kind of weird! The food was still good, they have a good assortment of beers on tap, and of course the v i b e is on point, especially being in the heart of downtown. Service was good, too, despite it being busy! review by - Yelp Hunter L.: AMAZING food! Fantastic drinks! Went here for Sunday brunch and loved it. This place is really cool inside, and the back patio is great. Very affordable not only for Charleston but for the amount of food you get.
